channel.title: Pk Evolution 317 Great Pkin Updated Daily New Items Clan Chat Many More Features
channel.description:
http://pkevolution.com
Welcome to Pk Evolution, a new RSPS.
~ Features ~
-Tons of Bosses! - Economic -All Spells 100% - All Magic Books -Item wielding fixes -Item bonus on equipment stats fix -Global objects & Npchandling & spawning -New Teleports -All skills working -Perfect Pk system - Lunars Ancient & Magic! - Helpful Staff - Awesome Wesite
~ PvM ~
- King Black Dragon Kalfite Queen - 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast -Fight caves (including jad) - Barrows - Flawless PVM!
~ PvP ~
- Flawless combat - Full Prayer And Food - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Pk Points for items - Flawless Prayer system
~ Miscellaneous ~
- All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Clan Chat - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP Rates - Equipment Stats Fix - Item On Item - Npc Handling - Npc Spawning - Configurations - Implements - Everything Flawless!, No Bugs, No Glitches, No Dupes!
Website Link: http://pkevolution.com
Updated 4/3/2013 - Added clan chat system as well as donator island We are looking for players to join this server i am also looking for a freindly helpful bunch of staff Hosted on a stable VPS Daily Updates Great Econamy And Pkin Events!
